scripts.deploy:development: dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater build && dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater sync --theme development
scripts.deploy:production: dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater build && dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater sync --theme production
scripts.test:deploy: dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater build --config test.config.js && dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater sync --theme development --config test.config.js
scripts.test:deploy:production: dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater build --config test.config.js && dotenv -e ../../.env -- slater sync --theme production --config test.config.js
